# isSelected

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the annotation view is in a selected state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isSelected: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Don’t set the value of this property directly. If the property contains [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the annotation view is displaying a callout.

## Managing the selection state

- **setSelected(_:animated:)**: Sets the selection state of the annotation view.
